text: If you were one of those kids that asked for a pony every birthday of your childhood, only to find yourself receiving last season ’ s Barbie doll and a McDonald ’ s McFlurry, you might want to look away now. To celebrate Harper Beckham ’ s birthday, David and Victoria have reportedly splashed the cash and bought her a £7, 000 pedigree pony.
